mapper.insert: INSERT INTO expressions (rules_id, element_num, parent_id, fact, type_id) select #{rules_id}, #{element_num}, #{parent_id}, #{fact}, id from type_of_expression where type_expression = #{type_expression}
mapper.select: select element_num, parent_id, fact, type_expression from expressions join type_of_expression on expressions.type_id = type_of_expression.id where rules_id=#{rules_id}
